video.title: Foot de rue
video.synopsis: As they endeavor to start a Street Football World Cup, Tag and his friends apply their passion for football to battle the hardships around them.

episodes.synopsis: Several of the boarders at the old Riffler Institute sneak away and take on a street football team. But the match is interrupted by the police.
episodes.title: Duel at the Old Port

episodes.synopsis: Today there is a ceremony in honor of the founder of the institute. Eloise, the last in the line of that dynasty, doesn't want to attend the event.
episodes.title: A Surprise Goal

episodes.synopsis: At Shark's request, all of the city's street football teams are meeting for the big vote. Will the new team of the Riffler Institute be accepted?
episodes.title: Storm Warning

episodes.synopsis: Shark organizes the Port Tournament. It's the first opportunity for the Rifflers to show their stuff. But at the tournament draw, Tag is despondent.
episodes.title: A Captain's Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Ben decides to sabotage the Port Tournament to show that Shark is incapable of being the leader of street football.
episodes.title: The Lion of Africa

episodes.synopsis: To recover their ball that a young deliveryman saved from the hands of the police, the Riffler Institute team will have to face the Shanghai Dragons.
episodes.title: The Paper Tigers

episodes.synopsis: Eloise and the boys of the Institute find street football players in Canada. They decide to create a network and a street football website.
episodes.title: The Birth of a Dream

episodes.synopsis: Former international champion Shine Ornando sets up a worldwide selection for the teams that will compete in the First World Cup of Street Football.
episodes.title: The Big Selection

episodes.synopsis: The Tek-No brothers must leave the Institute to become boarders with Olympic, but they find that leaving their buddies behind is hard to do.
episodes.title: An Impossible Choice

episodes.synopsis: The Bronx Devils, an all-girl team from New York, arrives and demands justice: Someone has forgotten to register them for the selection!
episodes.title: The Bronx Devils

episodes.synopsis: The teams have arrived from all around the world, and the opening ceremony festivities are in full swing.
episodes.title: The World Cup of Street Football

episodes.synopsis: Since the mayor and the police appear unable to restore calm in the city, some vigilante citizens are determined to impose order for them.
episodes.title: The Shadow Enemies

episodes.synopsis: Because they didn't follow the secret code of street football and thus endangered all the teams, Jane and Eduardo are suspended by their captains.
episodes.title: The Inseperables

episodes.synopsis: The Blues face the Brazilian Meninos, who are ahead in the rankings. Tag's desire to win increases when the Meninos' captain shows interest in ELoise.
episodes.title: The Passion of the Game

episodes.synopsis: The mayor decides to crush these street football hooligans who, in addition to sowing disorder in his city, have started to undermine his popularity.
episodes.title: The Guardian Angels

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Verrat has been robbed, and all the clues point to the boarders at the Riffler Institute -- particularly those who play street football!
episodes.title: Buried Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Tag kept kicking an adversary after he was down on the ground. Fédé and Chrono exclude him from the World Cup and declare the other team the winner.
episodes.title: A Black Night for a Red Card

episodes.synopsis: Tag is injured while training. Meanwhile, Maroni finds a perfect opportunity to set a trap for the hooligans of street football.
episodes.title: By the Light of the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Albert and Mr. Salim warn the Blues that the Scorpions, who they've beaten before, now have a secret weapon.
episodes.title: The Secret of the Scorpions

episodes.synopsis: To stop the tidal wave of street football, the mayor manipulates Eloise's parents and convinces them to lodge a complaint against Shine Ornando.
episodes.title: To Cut Off the Head

episodes.synopsis: The Shanghai Dragons are very, very strong! Once more they have triumphed, watched by the panic-stricken Blues -- who are their next opponents.
episodes.title: The Shanghai Dragons

episodes.synopsis: When Brains disappears just a few hours before the match, the Tek-No brothers, Tag and Eloise realize that no one was really looking out for him.
episodes.title: Brains Has Boogied

episodes.synopsis: At a grand festival organized by Eloise's parents for the semifinal draw, a sporting goods manufacturer offers to sponsor the finalists.
episodes.title: Sponsor

episodes.synopsis: The Wallabies are ready to face off against the Blues in the semifinal of the Street Football World Cup, but the Blues aren't ready at all.
episodes.title: Victory with the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: While the semifinal is tensely and enthusiastically watched by the entire city, Tag becomes aware that this magnificent adventure is nearing the end.
episodes.title: The Best Amongst Us

episodes.synopsis: All of the city is rallied behind the World Cup of Street Football. The mayor has invited a television station to broadcast the final to the world.
episodes.title: Black Out on the World Cup

episodes.synopsis: The TekNo brothers quit the Riffler Institute to join the city's professional club. The Blues aren't sure they want to continue playing without them.
episodes.title: Two Rookies for the Blues

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy is contacted by his ex-teammates  the Skyrunners, champions of urban ball, who want him to come back and join their team.
episodes.title: Juggling With His Past

episodes.synopsis: The Blues, who watch a tournament in the projects of Maryport, are introduced to Stephen, a boy in a wheelchair who throws down a challenge to them.
episodes.title: The Diehard

episodes.synopsis: The Blues watch the Tigers playing against their future opponents, the Desperados -- a match that counts as a qualifier for the World Cup.
episodes.title: Pepped Up

episodes.synopsis: Just because they're girls, Samira and her friend Manuela are ruthlessly kicked out of the indoor football tournament organized in their projects.
episodes.title: Macho Match

episodes.synopsis: The Blues have an idea: go to Senegal with Gabe to help the less fortunate and attend the next street football World Cup qualifying finals.
episodes.title: Operation Dakar

episodes.synopsis: The Blues finally arrive in Dakar, and Fede is there to welcome them along with the Sai-Sai, the best team in all of Senegal.
episodes.title: The Sai-Sai

episodes.synopsis: One day, Jeremy discovers, completely by chance, an adoption file in the principal's office that reveals the identity of Tag's father.
episodes.title: Too Many Fathers for Tag

episodes.synopsis: To improve their agility and their technique, the coach of the Teknos organizes a little street football tournament with the Blues.
episodes.title: Sidelined

episodes.synopsis: The Wildcats have set up camp near Maryport. They decide to make a name for themselves in street football by challenging the Blues.
episodes.title: The Wildcats

episodes.synopsis: As the Blues prepare for an important qualifying match, Gabe, under the influence of Marie, starts to drift away from football.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: During their matches, Tag and Jeremy each hog the ball for themselves in order to score the maximum number of goals.
episodes.title: Hogging the Ball

episodes.synopsis: The Blues are invited by Fede to Greenland to train a team who needs to play in the qualifications for the Far North.
episodes.title: The Polar Bears

episodes.synopsis: Victoria promises to take revenge on the Blues -- and on Eloise in particular.
episodes.title: An Old Grudge

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy, who brags that he knows martial arts, tries to make up for his weaknesses with a master of kung fu.
episodes.title: Footballs of Shame

episodes.synopsis: The very prestigious boarding school of St. Xavier decides not to let Riffler Institute have all the glory of winning their matches.
episodes.title: The Black Devils

episodes.synopsis: The Blues get a message from Zanghezino, who announces that he can no longer compete in the Latin American final qualifications.
episodes.title: A Friend in Need

episodes.synopsis: Even if Zanghezino is relieved that his father's health problems are under control, he still needs to work to help his family.
episodes.title: Foot Favelas

episodes.synopsis: Twenty-four minutes of play remain for the Blues vs. the Tokyo Samurai when Jeremy gives the ball a high-powered kick and it explodes.
episodes.title: Minutes Flat

episodes.synopsis: Eloise must spend time with her parents' friends' son, the pretentious Thibault, who ends up falling in love with Eloise.
episodes.title: Yam Force

episodes.synopsis: The Magic Boars become more popular. They're still not good enough to play against the world champions, but a friendly match is arranged nonetheless.
episodes.title: Forgotten Bonds

episodes.synopsis: The Blues are confronted by a group of wild fans called Total Blues, whose behavior could compromise the Blues' participation in the Second World Cup.
episodes.title: Out of Control

episodes.synopsis: A friendly match is set up between the Blues and Victoria's team, the Black Devils, to raise money for a charitable organization.
episodes.title: Trap Match

episodes.synopsis: The Blues have a match planned, but when Jeremy hears that his favorite rap group will perform in Maryport, he nixes the match.
episodes.title: A Pact With the Devils

episodes.synopsis: The second World Cup Street Football qualifications move along fine -- until two thieves decide to seize the opportunity to make their mark.
episodes.title: A Dangerous Game

episodes.synopsis: The results of the qualifications for the World Cup arrive from the four corners of the world with the name of the first qualifiers.
episodes.title: Final Combat

episodes.synopsis: The Rifflers are qualified to play for the World Cup, but their first game is against the Dolphins, who seem to be tougher than a bunch of teenagers.
episodes.title: A New World Cup

episodes.synopsis: Tek is fed up with being mistaken for his twin brother. He tries everything he can to be different, which ends up damaging the Blues' ability to play.
episodes.title: Alter Ego

episodes.synopsis: The Rifflers are up against a Russian team: a group of circus kids whose strongest player turns out to be a little monkey.
episodes.title: The Circus Kids

episodes.synopsis: The Rifflers are accusing Brains of missing too much training practice because he's spending all his time with one of the girls on the Saï Saï team.
episodes.title: The 6th Saï Saï

episodes.synopsis: Ben returns to Port Marie, but is it because of homesickness or something more calculated? Meanwhile, someone is playing dirty tricks on the Rifflers.
episodes.title: A Troublesome Substitute

episodes.synopsis: A reality television show wants to follow the World Cup. After the Bronx Devils are featured, soon every other team wants to be filmed 24-7, too.
episodes.title: Football Stars

episodes.synopsis: The Rifflers have lost their spirit, so they call a coach to get them back on track. But they're having trouble accepting the new coach's approach.
episodes.title: A Trainer for the Rifflers

episodes.synopsis: Port Marie citizens are increasingly complaining of damage caused by the street football teams. Shark warns the players, but they protest.
episodes.title: Return of the Mega Killers

episodes.synopsis: Tag is injured and Jeremy has to take over as captain of the Rifflers. Yet the responsibility puts him under such pressure that he becomes unbearable.
episodes.title: Captain Jem'

episodes.synopsis: Increasingly exasperated by Jeremy's childish behavior, Samira meets Matt, a handsome young guy whose independence proves to be very attractive.
episodes.title: Samira Takes Off

episodes.synopsis: After overhearing about Eloise’s parents planning to take her overseas, Victoire plans a kidnapping to end the Rifflers' World Cup dreams.
episodes.title: The Disappearance

episodes.synopsis: As the Rifflers try to learn more about Farah, the captain of the formidable Malaysian Tigers, they make a startling discovery about her identity.
episodes.title: A Girl Not Like the Other

episodes.synopsis: Tag is convinced that the Iroquois have cheated, but everybody thinks he's just being a sore loser and no one will support his attempts to find proof.
episodes.title: Cheating Is Not Playing

episodes.synopsis: A mayoral candidate is accusing the Street Football World Cup of disturbing public order. Meanwhile, Jeremy is saving to buy a present for Samira.
episodes.title: A New Mayor

episodes.synopsis: Victoire sets up an Eloise fan club. Celebrity status soon becomes a handicap for Eloise, who can't play a match without an attendant horde of fans.
episodes.title: Diva

episodes.synopsis: As the team bickers yet again, Fédé assigns Brains and Lil' Dragon the task of drawing up the definitive rules of street football.
episodes.title: Rules Are the Rules

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Eloise befriend Atsuko, a girl player from the Mangas. But soon, Eloise feels she's being excluded from the closeness between Sam and Atsuko.
episodes.title: Atsuko's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Eloise learns she has to leave Port Marie, and the news shocks the team. Everyone suddenly realizes they’ll all be parting ways at the end of summer.
episodes.title: Afraid to Say Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: The Pharaohs' girl goalkeeper seems to posses a strange power for destabilizing the opposition strikers. And there goes Tek, falling in love with her.
episodes.title: TEKnique of Flirting

episodes.synopsis: Fédé takes the kids on a cruise so they can rest for the final stages of the World Cup. But the kids are planning a birthday surprise for him.
episodes.title: A Cruise With Nico

episodes.synopsis: In Tunis, Nico and Fédé are struck to see football played on every street. Nico challenges Fédé to put together a team that can beat his own.
episodes.title: Welcome to Tunis

episodes.synopsis: When provisions start disappearing and strange noises emerge in the night, the kids start wondering if the freighter is haunted by its former captain.
episodes.title: Ghost Stories

episodes.synopsis: While Fédé is distracted by a malicious administrative inspector, Fédé's former teammate Jacky discreetly tries to turn the kids against him.
episodes.title: A Blast from the Past

episodes.synopsis: When a small traveling fair arrives and sets up in Port Marie, the kids are disturbed when a fortuneteller predicts a gloomy future for their team.
episodes.title: Written in the Stars

episodes.synopsis: The Rifflers find it very suspicious that they can't get any information about the Dolphins. Meanwhile, Victoire is scheming her next dirty trick.
episodes.title: The Winning Spirit

episodes.synopsis: When Tag flies to Argentina with his dad, the team is left with no captain. Then, Brains gets injured, and one of the twins is picked for a pro team.
episodes.title: The Rifflers Forever
